data.text: @CityNewsVAN Stop spreading false information. The truth is that only very few of British Columbians are worried about the future of the pandemic.

@CityNewsVAN Bigger threat now is not the pandemic. It’s inflation, however and whatever the cause is: central bank stimulus, Russia, trade imbalance…it’s going to hurt a lot of people everywhere which is not easily tested by a kit/device/lab.
@CityNewsVAN My goodness, what will they ever do with their paranoid selves?

@CityNewsVAN End the charade. No one cares. Quit printing this bullshit. The reports are out now. Go read Pfizer report.Start at page 30 and hope to god you didn’t put that shit  into your body.People should start worrying that they believed these people telling you to jab
@Claytoncyre @CityNewsVAN Right? What would make people comfortable? Im a sensitive sally but this is way too soft for me
@CityNewsVAN Well isn't this just propaganda from the municipal level.  What BS
